@Module.Name: Select
@Module.Description: This module is a selection model, selecting the 5 possible component without relativity ranking to be acted on catering to user's intent
@Module.Note: This individual module only select 5 highly related components,without ranking them,and without analyzing the correctness of the components aligning with user's content

Output.<button id=1 class='' description='Meet': This component opens the Google Meet page and isn't related to accessing the user's emails.
Output.<div id=2 class='com.google.android.gm:i: The button triggers the email compose interface. While it's an important feature, it doesn't directly align with the current user goal of viewing all emails.
Output.<div id=3 class='com.google.android.gm:i: This button opens a navigation drawer that includes an 'All Mail' option, directly supporting the user's intended task.
Output.<button id=4 class='com.google.android.g: While the button provides important settings and account options, it isn't directly linked with the action of accessing all emails in the account.
Output.<div id=5 class='' description='Open nav: This button, similar to the previous one, opens a navigation drawer and potentially has the 'All Mail' option too. Hence, should be considered.

@Module.Name: Plan
@Module.Description: This module is a plan module, planning the next action based on the selected components, whether click or edit

candidate1.reason: Switching to the 'Meet' feature is not relevant to accessing emails.

candidate2.reason: To compose a new email, not relevant to accessing all emails.

candidate3.reason: To open the navigation drawer and search for emails.

candidate4.reason: To open the account and settings, not relevant to accessing all emails.

candidate5.reason: To open the navigation drawer, not relevant to accessing all emails.

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@Module.Name: Decide
@Module.Description: This module is a decision module, deciding the final action based on the evaluation result, whether complete or wrong or go on

Output.reason: The user is on the main interface but instead of accessing the mail list, they clicked on 'Open navigation drawer'. The current screen does not show the list of all emails. Therefore, the user went into a wrong branch and needs to take the correct action to view all mails.
